title: Honeymoon's Over, Now What?
features: Every couple looks forward to their honeymoon.
But what does life look like when the honeymoon ends?
What happens when the excitement of the new fades into the natural flow of life?
was created as a call to action for couples to live in the fullness of God’s design for marriage. As we transition from the altar, to the everyday issues, we have to be intentional with all we do!

There is no such thing as neutral. If we are not intentionally pursuing growth in our marriages, then selfishness and disunity will creep in, which will ultimately harm any couple. In this book, Soluto + Lola tackle relevant issues that many couples face today, such as:
Feeling like roommates instead of spouses
Feeling like roommates instead of spouses
Communicating what you really want in your sex life (Sex 201)
Communicating what you really want in your sex life (Sex 201)
Being present in the age of social media
Being present in the age of social media
Every couple plans to have a great honeymoon. This book was written to give couples hope for a great marriage long after the honeymoon ends.
description: are college sweethearts and the founders of Married on Purpose, an organization created to reach and empower couples to develop thriving marriages through transparency, community, and authentic relationships. They accomplish this through speaking, writing, mentoring couples, and hosting an annual marriage conference. They are also privileged to serve as the Directors of Marriage Ministry at their local church. They live in Dallas, TX with their son Micah.To learn more about the Ubas and their ministry visit their website at bemarriedonpurpose.com
